channel.title: Cheap dedicated server
channel.description:
hi i run a hosting company that tbh didnt kick off very well so now i have sold off all my other servers other than a few and i have one left for sale and at a very cheap price the specs are :
dual core 3.0 ghz prosseser 1 gig ram 40 gig hdd and the bandwisth will be unmetered windows xp pro ( i installed this as i know it is easier )
all this for £15/month
i know this is not the best but i have made this personally for a rsps
if you are intrested please post a comment and i will give u my details so u can contact me
